casebody.data:
STANDARD INSURANCE COMPANY, a corporation, v. Floyd M. BLAIR et al. No. 6091. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. March 24, 1959. Howell & Smith, Oklahoma City, Okh, for appellant. Duvall & Head and Cargill, Cargill & Chiaf, Oklahoma City, Okh, for appellees.

Before BRATTON, Chief Judge, and PICKETT, Circuit Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed on motion of appellant.
